scripts.test: bun run -F @qduc/easyocr-core test && bun run -F @qduc/easyocr-node test && bun run -F @qduc/easyocr-web test && bun run -F @qduc/easyocr-cli test
scripts.build: bun run -F @qduc/easyocr-core build && bun run -F @qduc/easyocr-node build && bun run -F @qduc/easyocr-web build && bun run -F @qduc/easyocr-cli build
